alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owsley, central Jackson and southwestern Lee Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Turkey Foot, or near McKee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Zion around 605 PM EDT. Arvel and Old Orchard around 610 PM EDT. Green Hall around 615 PM EDT. Earnestville, Wild Dog, Banford, Travellers Rest and Sturgeon around 620 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Delvinta, Cressmont, Vincent, Yellow Rock, Endee, Willow Shoals, Ida May, Caryton, Heidelberg and Scoville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
